ordinarily will respond to the claim within days of the date on which it is received however if special require an extension of the period of time for claim the day period can be extended for an additional days by giving you written notice of the extension and the reason that the extension is necessary if the claim for benefit is you will receive written notice of the amount of your benefit and the date on which will begin if your claim is in whole or in part you will be told in writing the specific for the decision and will receive an explanation of the for the decision if you do not agree with the decision you can request that the chief executive officer reconsider his or her decision by filing written request for review within days after notice that the claim been you or your representative can also present written which explain why you believe that the benefit should be and may review all pertinent plan generally the decision will be within days after the chief executive officer request for reconsideration however if special require delay the review may take up to days if decision can not be made within the day period you will be notified of this fact in writing you
